name: Space Grapple
description:
Alpha  2.2 of this project.

Now starting level testing! Feedback appreciated.

Escape to access menu (restart level, control sound)

A and D to move left and right, in the air you can also use W and S for greater vertical control while grappling

Space to jump

Left Mouse to grapple

Right Mouse to reel in grapple

Q for explosion (Farther reach, but accumulates less points and takes more hits to kill aliens)

Started off a GameDev.TV Challenge Club challenge, though it barely resembles the base

Credits: GameDev.TV Challenge Club
